document_data.name: ''Circlet of Seven Serpents''
document_data.mainbody: A '''''circlet of seven serpents''''' was a type of wondrous [[circlet]].
document_data.Description: These circlets were made of serpentine stone and resembled seven serpents intertwined, with each devouring the tale of another. Tiny [[emerald]]s were embedded in place of their eyes and their detailed scales were set apart by a lattice of [[silver]].
document_data.Powers: Once per day, the wielder of a ''circlet of seven serpents'' could cast effects similar to the [[spell]]s ''[[charm monster]]'' and ''[[true strike]]''. They also would be capable of casting effects similar to the spells ''[[mage hand]]'' and ''[[open/close]]'' at will from a range of {{SI|25|ft|long=yes}}.
document_data.History: The first circlet was crafted by unknown bard, though many believed that they were of [[Jhaamdath]]an origin.
document_data.Notable Users: Since the founding of the kingdom of [[Sembia]], they were typically known to be used by [[naga]]s in the [[Eastern Heartlands]].
